                                                                java.lang.Object... path)

      • getComponentReplaced1

        public net.kyori.adventure.text.Component getComponentReplaced1​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> map,
                                                                boolean json,
                                                                java.lang.Object... path)
        Getteng deserialized Component from locale configuration node.
        After receiving the object, the elements are replaced according to the map.
        The key of the map must be an element contained in the string. The key in the string will be replaced by the value.
        Parameters:
        map - - Map for replacing elements from a line in the configuration.
        json - - If true, then the Component will be received from the JSON string.
        path - - Path in the config file.
        Returns:
        Component

      • checkComponent

        public abstract boolean checkComponent​(boolean json,
                                       net.kyori.adventure.text.Component component,
                                       java.lang.String comment,
                                       java.lang.Object... path)
        Checking for the existence of a path in the localization file. And the serialization of the Component class to JSON string.
        The path is created if it does not exist.
        Parameters:
        json - - If true, the Component will be serialized to a JSON string.
        component - - Component class
        comment - - Comment to path. Not necessary. You can specify null. Not used with JSON configuration.
        path - - Path in the config file.
        Returns:
        false if the path already exists.
        true if path is created.

      • checkListComponents

        public abstract boolean checkListComponents​(boolean json,
                                            java.util.List<net.kyori.adventure.text.Component> components,
                                            java.lang.String comment,
                                            java.lang.Object... path)
        Checking for the existence of a path in the localization file. And the serialization of the Component classes list to JSON strings.
        The path is created if it does not exist.
        Parameters:
        json - - If true, then the list of Component classes will be serialized to JSON strings.
        components - - List of Component classes.
        comment - - Comment to path. Not necessary. You can specify null. Not used with JSON configuration.
        path - - Path in the config file.
        Returns:
        false if the path already exists.
        true if path is created.

      • checkString

        public abstract boolean checkString​(java.lang.String string,
                                    java.lang.String comment,
                                    java.lang.Object... path)
        Checking for the existence of a path in the localization file. And set String value.
        The path is created if it does not exist.
        Parameters:
        string - - String class
        comment - - Comment to path. Not necessary. You can specify null. Not used with JSON configuration.
        path - - Path in the config file.
        Returns:
        false if the path already exists.
        true if path is created.

      • checkListStrings

        public abstract boolean checkListStrings​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> strings,
                                         java.lang.String comment,
                                         java.lang.Object... path)
        Checking for the existence of a path in the localization file. And set list of String classes.
        The path is created if it does not exist.
        Parameters:
        strings - - List of String classes
        comment - - Comment to path. Not necessary. You can specify null. Not used with JSON configuration.
        path - - Path in the config file.
        Returns:
        false if the path already exists.
        true if path is created.

      • replaceMap

        @Deprecated
public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> replaceMap​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> keys,
                                                                                java.util.List<java.lang.Object> values)
        Deprecated.
        See TextUtils.replaceMap(java.util.List<java.lang.String>, java.util.List<java.lang.Object>)
        Creating a map for replacing values in text components.
        In this map all values are converted to strings.
        For correct replacement it is necessary in both lists the order of adding data must be the same. For example key 1 = value 1, key 4 = value 4.
        Parameters:
        keys - - Keys contained in the text.
        values - - Values that should be placed in the text instead of keys.

      • replaceMapComponents

        @Deprecated
public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​net.kyori.adventure.text.Component> replaceMapComponents​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> keys,
                                                                                                            java.util.List<net.kyori.adventure.text.Component> values)
        Deprecated.
        See TextUtils.replaceMapComponents(java.util.List<java.lang.String>, java.util.List<net.kyori.adventure.text.Component>)
        Creating a map for replacing values in text components.
        For correct replacement it is necessary in both lists the order of adding data must be the same. For example key 1 = value 1, key 4 = value 4.
        Parameters:
        keys - - Keys contained in the text.
        values - - Values that should be placed in the text instead of keys.
